title: Do you have a .gitattributes file?
body: Quoting Git book: Using attributes, you can do things like specify separate merge strategies for individual files or directories in your project, tell Git how to diff non-text files, or have Git filter content before you check it into or out of Git. [More](https://git-scm.com/book/pl/v1/Dostosowywanie-Gita-Git-Attributes).
